questions: What is your SteamID64 or link to your Steam profile?
What role are you intertested in?
Do you have any previous experience in the role you are applying for?
What makes you think you are the right fit for the role you are applying for
Why are you applying for this role?
Do you have any Rust game bans, or any server bans for any Rust servers? If yes, please explain.
Do you have any other Steam account that you have used to play Rust? If yes, please provide the SteamID64's or links to the steam profiles for these accounts.
pre-message: Thank you for your interest in joining our staff. Please answer the following questions to start your application.
post-message: Thank you for taking the time to apply to our staff. We will let you know if you move on to the next step, you can expect a reply within the next 24-48 hours.
accept-message: We have reviewed your application and would like to offer you a spot on the staff team. If we haven't already a member of RustNite Management will reach out for the next steps.
deny-message: We have reviewed your staff application and unfortunately have decided not to offer you a staff position at RustNite at this time. We welcome to you re-apply in the future.
feedback_questions: How was your experience in your ticket?
What would you recommend for improvements?
What you rate your experience out of 5?
Would you be happy to use our system again?
You can only have 5 questions in your forms.
successful_feedback_message: Thanks for your feedback! It really helps us make our systems better for everyone.
